title: Zelenskyy delivers 'sensitive' letter from wife to Melania Trump
shortDescription: The International Criminal Court has indicted Vladimir Putin for the unlawful deportation and transfer of children.

title: Zelenskyy, European leaders arrive at White House
shortDescription: Ukrainian President Zelenskyy arrived at the White House for talks with President Trump as European leaders await expanded session.

title: See Zelenskyy rock a military-style suit in DC after Trump jab
shortDescription: See what Ukrainian President Zelenskyy wore to meet with President Trump on Aug. 18, 2025, after Trump complained about Zelenskyy’s lack of formal attire months prior.

title: Trump, Zelenskyy meet on Ukraine war
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy held high-stakes talks at the White House aimed at ending the war in Ukraine.

title: Trump targets mail-in voting again
shortDescription: President Donald Trump threatened an executive order to end mail-in voting before the 2026 midterms.

title: Oval Office meeting again puts Trump-Zelenskyy relationship to test
shortDescription: Trump’s appraisal of the Ukrainian president has been an exercise in zigzag diplomacy as their relationship has unfolded since Trump's first term.

title: States sue Trump administration over restrictions on crime victim funding
shortDescription: Democratic states want to stop the Trump administration from tying funding for crime victims to states' cooperation with immigration enforcement.

title: European leaders join Zelenskyy in DC for Trump meeting
shortDescription: European leaders traveled to Washington, D.C., for a meeting with Ukrainian President Zelenskyy and President Trump to discuss ceasefire, peace efforts.

title: Trump vows to eliminate mail-in voting before 2026 midterms
shortDescription: US President Donald Trump has denounced mail-in voting, pledging to “lead a movement” to abolish the practice ahead of the 2026 midterm elections.

title: Ukraine supporters descend on DC for Trump-Zelenskyy meeting
shortDescription: Protesters gathered near the White House on Aug. 18, 2025, in support of Ukraine.

title: Mark Hamill says he nearly left US after Trump re-election
shortDescription: ‘Star Wars’ actor Mark Hamill has revealed that he considered leaving the US after President Donald Trump’s 2024 re-election.

title: What time is the Trump-Zelenskyy meeting? See the schedule
shortDescription: The US president is hosting a delegation of European leaders and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy on Aug. 18. Here's how to watch.

title: Newsom trolls Trump with deleted 'bela' post. What does it mean?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump posted and then deleted 'Bela' on Truth Social. California Gov. Gavin Newsom has used it to troll the president amid state spat

title: Texas Democrats return to end redistricting standoff
shortDescription: Democrats' exit from Texas two weeks ago stalled a Republican plan to re-draw congressional maps.

title: Trump aims to end mail-in voting, threatens order against state rules
shortDescription: Trump threatens to end mail-in voting, although states set election laws.

title: Trump ushers Zelenskyy into White House showdown: live updates
shortDescription: Ukraine's Volodymyr Zelenskyy and top European leaders are in Washington for make-or-break meetings with President Trump over the Russian invasion.

title: Protests erupt over Trump’s redistricting plan
shortDescription: Over 300 hundred protests were held Saturday against President Trump’s redistricting plan in Texas.

title: Trump to host Zelenskyy, European leaders
shortDescription: Ukrainian President Zelenskyy, President Trump and top European leaders will meet in Washington Monday to discuss ceasefire and peace efforts.

title: Details of Trump-Putin summit left behind on Alaska hotel printer: What to know
shortDescription: Government documents with details about meeting schedules and seating charts − as well as an extravagant menu − were accidentally left in a hotel printer.

title: Melania Trump pens letter to Putin urging him to protect the world's children
shortDescription: In a letter to Russian President Vladimir Putin, first lady Melania Trump urged him to think about the future for world's children

title: European leaders to join Zelenskyy in DC after Trump embraces Putin stance on war
shortDescription: European leaders will join Ukraine's Zelenskyy for a meeting in Washington days after Donald Trump's summit with Russia's Putin in Alaska.

title: Over 300 protests held Saturday against Trump redistricting push
shortDescription: Pro-democracy activists and labor groups held hundreds of rallies and other events across the United States on Saturday protesting the Trump administration's push for Texas to redraw its congressional map in favor of Republicans.

title: 'Free D.C.': Protesters gather amid Trump's U.S. capital takeover
shortDescription: See protesters rally near the White House after President Donald Trump's seizure of Washington, D.C.

title: Trump offers Putin, Zelenskyy contrasting approaches
shortDescription: Trump's dealmaking style offers contrasting treatment of a U.S. ally and adversary in his peace gambit
